metadata.name: "PHANTABEAR x RAW" Magical Feast #1
metadata.description: "Welcome to the first ever crossover feast hosted by "Phanta Bear" and "RAW". Through taste and vision, you can experience the art of collision between trend and cuisine. The exclusive dish "Afro Bear" was specially customised for Phanta Bear by Chef André. The crossover sparks combine Jay Chou's unrestrained creativity and Chef André's ingenious delicacies to debut at the exclusive party. The exclusive dish "Afro Bear" will lead all the guests to experience the soul and charm of the brand, and truly bring Phanta Bear sense of trend into memories through the taste. This NFT is the certificate of participating in the historical event on 2022.06.27 and also the cetificate of participating in the first ever joint production of Phanta Bear and RAW, with an access to the exclusive cuisine designed for Phanta Bear. For more information and potential surprises of this NFT, please visit and register on EchoX - Curation and Utility Redeemable Platform : https://www.echox.app
